website_summaries.verdict: This pack of two drain protectors is designed to fit down into standard-size drains.
pros: Keeps the hair from going down the drain
Can fit in either a sink or a tub
Stainless steel model has a nice look
cons: Will not last as long as others on the market
Will not work on shower stall drains

customer_reviews.title: Saves money, protects plumbing
customer_reviews.text: I snaked all my drains and then put one of these in my tub and left the sink without because it had a built in plug. Now six months later I have to snake the sink because it is clogged up with hair; but the tub that had the TubShroom still drains quick and easy. I'm going to remove the plug in the sink because we don't use it anyway and add the SinkShroom. It's going to save me the hassle out snaking the drain in the future. Great product. TubShroom and SinkShroom are one of the best low cost preventative investments that a home owner can make.
customer_reviews.author: J.R. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Simple and it works, with a new potential source of income!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I did not know just how much of my girlfriends hair was going down the drain and aiding in clogs. Now I do, and I’m thinking about opening up a wig shop for organic, natural, gluten free, “real” hair. Any investors?
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: I love my TubShroom and SinkShroom!
customer_reviews.text: I love my TubShroom and SinkShroom! I follow the Curly Girl Method for my hair, so I never brush it. I only comb through with a wide toothed comb in the shower with lots of conditioner. This makes it nearly impossible to keep my hair out of the drain. With the TubShroom, I don't have to worry about it! I simply clean the TubShroom after my shower and go about my day. Same with the sink! Styling my hair, I tend to get gel and hair all over my hands. Now I can wash them like nothing knowing the SinkShroom will catch any hair left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and clean
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product, especially the tub shroom. We got the kit that has a smaller one too. That was a very pleasant surprise because we have not gotten around to replacing the vanity and sink, and our bathroom sink cap thingy has been missing sincewe bought the place. Both clean up very easily, it is a simple thing to remove hair strands (and it catches a lot on the tub shroom). It also catches soap, which is good for keeping the drains clearing quickly. As long as the shroom is kept clear, the water drains quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: All these DON’T work
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit drains. This is one out of three items from this series (all have failed). In the other bathroom my daughter used it and it never fit in and she pushed it down took a tub/shower and was standing in 2’ of water since it wouldn’t let water escape.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: These things are magical! I shed alot of hair when I shower and this thing catches it all!!! Super easy to clean and the chrome looks great and more inconspicuous than the funky colored ones. Now if only the sink shroom could catch all the beard trimmings 🤔
customer_reviews.author: ShutUpAndTakeMy$

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my bath tub! No more cleaning the drain every other week because of long hair !
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: The bottom part snapped off in my bathtub with normal use
customer_reviews.text: It broke in my bathtub with normal use. Currently trying to figure out how to fix bathtub. As you can see in pictures the bottom part literally detached itself in my tub.
customer_reviews.author: sadlyhonest

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Actually life changing. I thought I had serious drainage issues and was prepared to spend a fortune to redo my bathroom. I tried snaking the drain and the tubshroom and my tub drains fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Svecy

customer_reviews.title: Broke within two weeks
customer_reviews.text: The Sinkshroom did not fit my sink. The Tubshroom's "chrome" (plastic) top popped off after just a week of showers. I guess it's doing fine catching hair.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Rehak

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: These work great. My husband bought them because I am having post partum hair loss majorly. Sad to see all the hair I am losing but means it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few drain solutions that actually works the way it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: TERRY T

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! Had one for my bath tub and recently saw they had one for the sink. These are a must have if you have long hair, they are awesome and they actually catch the hair!
customer_reviews.author: jacdv

customer_reviews.title: Shrooms are super
customer_reviews.text: My tub drain cover was missing and finding a replacement was impossibly difficult, tried over 5. This is flexible & functional. Good in the bathroom sink too. Sits a little higher than the original but after a few days you forget that it seemed too tall on the day you installed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for preventing gunk obstructing drains
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to use the shower one yet because I have to get a plumber to remove the old drain cover, but I love it for my bathroom sink. Even my home inspection guy said this will help to prevent future problems. I just moved into a new house, and want to prevent as many problems as possible! It's a great design, and easy to get in and out. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. This captures the hair in the shower drain better than over-the-drain screens. I like the clear/chrome color combo too. The only think I don't like is that the cap itself is branded, which makes it look very cheap, particularly in the bathroom sink.
customer_reviews.author: Smart ShopHer

customer_reviews.title: Effects drainage
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product but it slowed my drainage to to point of filling up the sink and did not catch much hair. Tub shoom did not fit my stand-alone shower drain either. Not effective and high priced.
customer_reviews.author: Deedra Dee

customer_reviews.title: Easy, breezy
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to put in the drain, haven't done the sink because I have to remove the inner part but works great in the shower, easy to clean. I would definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Bettina Culmone

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Not a universal size for anyone looking for any easy fit the tub one did not even close to fit it was too long and too wide.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, Overpriced and Too Big for My Sink Drain!
customer_reviews.text: As the title states this item is to big for my drain. My sink is not old, maybe 8 years or so but this item is too big. I don’t have a huge sink though. Even so, I would not buy this if I had a bigger sink drain either as it is flimsy and way over-priced. I had high hopes that it would suit my needs but, again, disappointed in quality of some products sold these days.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Great little invention
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my bathroom sink and one for my tub. My sink was missing the drain and I accidentally dropped things into the void. The Shroom helps prevent this and catches hair also. The one in the tub doesn't set down as far as I'd like in the drain (I have an older tub). It does catch quite a bit of hair just the same. Both are easy to clean. If you wait too long, they get a bit yucky. I use a thick paper towel to pull the hair off. I've cleaned the shroom with bathtub cleaner and a toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: laurie.j62

customer_reviews.title: The water doesn't drain as it should
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the chrome mushroom plug. It looks really nice and natural in the sinks and tubs. However, I'm not sure why, but the water does not drain as they say . Everytime I use the faucet, and even though it's clean I have to adjust the mushroom plug in the sink or tub because they fill up as if they were plugged up. So what's happening? Instead of adjusting it, my family is removing it. Kinda defeating the whole purpose. Go figure 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Kelly-Corn

customer_reviews.title: Get the tub shroom, skip the sink model.
customer_reviews.text: The tub shroom is working well, even though it wants to fall flat into the drain instead of staying up enough to let water through. We manage. The sink shroom has fingers to help keep it above the drain, but if you are using it in your main bathroom sink beware- it gets plugged up from shave cream and toothpaste. After a few months of use we had to throw it out because I could not get it clean enough to let water through.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi

customer_reviews.title: Stops clogs. Needs frequent cleaning. Gets stained.
customer_reviews.text: This really does keep drains from clogging. I have used 2 for over a year and bought more. However, they do not clean easily. I even spoke with someone at the company who gave me a homemade formula and it didn’t clean it. It is porous enough to retain the color of whatever mineral is in your water. Turning mine pink along with grey from grease from when I wash my hands. Hair does pull out easily and it does not stink if you do clean it regularly. Obviously I bought more but wish they would reformulate it to not be so porous.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Does what it claims
customer_reviews.text: Got the 2 pack, one for the sink and one for the bathtub. We are missing the middle drain plug in our bathroom sink and I've almost lost a ring and some medicine down it a few times. I got these to prevent that issue. They catch everything and have prevented few dropped prescription pills from ending up down the drain. I also trim my beard in the sink and it catches nearly all the hair even when it's only a 1/4 inch long. Just pull it out, wipe it off over the trash and it's good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Joleme

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these, but they are a bit flimsy in the middle. It does the job it promised...catching items from going down tge drain. However, it is also kind of gross cleaning off all the stuff it catches, as well as a daily chore. I have found my sink is clogged as often with this than the drain it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: MamaWorkIt

customer_reviews.title: Tub shroom is great, sink shroom less great
customer_reviews.text: The Tub Shroom is great — gross and nasty to clean, but there’s no way around that. But reasonably easy, and it’s very effective. Seems to hold its shape and last longer than other hair catchers I’ve tried. The sink shroom though.... I’m not a big fan. It’s smaller, and therefore thinner in material. So it’s shape gets distorted pretty quickly. Already losing it’s tight fit, so not as effective. Doesn’t seem like a great solution for the sink. Better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: High hopes were dashed
customer_reviews.text: Trying to figure out something to put in the tub for hair, and the sink (so nerf balls wouldn't constantly end up down the drain). Instead, the water flow down the drain decreased so much, that we still ended up standing in a tub of water by the end of the shower. Then it was massively difficult to get the hair/soap off of it, even when it was dry. I was really hoping for an "easy fix", but instead we are still hunting for a solution.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We have a septic system, so if we get a clogged drain, dumping chemicals into the pipes is not an option. And that little zipper looking thing to clear clogs gags me. So to avoid all of that, I bought these. And I love them! I could not believe how well they work, catching even the shortest of hairs! I’d recommend cleaning them out at least twice a week. It will still function if you do it less often, but the hair and soap scum just seem more gross if left for longer.
customer_reviews.author: Heytherewhiskey

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Works great, especially in the shower
customer_reviews.text: This couldn't be easier to "install" (just put it in the drain) or to clean (assuming you don't gag at the sight of wet hair haha). It catches all the stuff you'd be trying to remove with a drain snake later on. The one for the shower is a godsend. The sink one is going to see much less hair, so is less important to have, but still worth it. Just make sure anywhere you put these has the little metal "grid" for it to rest on about 2 inches inside the drain, otherwise it can't work.
customer_reviews.author: J. Norvell

customer_reviews.title: Best tub strainer I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I've used several different strainers and the same thing always happens. You have to snake a slow draining pipe after a few weeks or months. I've had this product for several months and the pipes have drained perfectly ever since I started using it. It catches all the hair which is the big issue for us. It is easy to clean, even if a bit icky to pick the soap-matted hairs off of it. I haven't snaked once since we put it in. If you use your tub as a tub and need a stopper you're going to need to swap this out with a stopper for those uses. Otherwise just leave it in and let it do it's job!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love the shower drain protector. Collects hair and allows for easy removal. The sink drain protector, like many other reviewers said, gets black and moldy looking. I took it out and cleaned it with bleach at least once per week because of seeing this problem in other reviews. It did not stop the protector from turning black. I do not have this problem with the shower drain protector. That being said they both work well and do exactly what they’re supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Good product, have long hair and it does catch the hair. However because of the long hair I do have to clean after every shower. Only problem I had with installation was it was to long and hit the water blocker in the drain hole. I cut the last row on each side and it fits over the blocker wire. Maybe that I live in an old Apartment building so maybe older plumbing. But I don’t have problems with standing water anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hudick

customer_reviews.title: SOLVES CLOGGED HAIR ONCE AND FOR ALL.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE MY SHROOMS. This gadget is my answer to clogged shower bathtub and sink drains. I have four daughters and the hair in the drains is NONSTOP. I used to use dangerous chemicals or stick a zip it stick down the drain. Well, I tried this gadget and it REALLY WORKS!!!! You pop it into your drain, it collects hair and gunk and you check it every few days and clean it off. SUPER EASY. I haven't had a clogged drain since. The only thing is my cat likes to get in the tub and steal it every so often🤣
customer_reviews.author: Maura Pitman

customer_reviews.title: After 20 years of headaches, this gadget saved my sanity!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this does exactly what it advertised and fixes a problem I’ve had with this unit’s bathrooms since 2001! The chrome version is plastic to look like chrome and it matches chrome metal fixtures perfectly. Eventually both bathrooms will be gutted and renovated but for now, I’m paying off mortgage early and learning to fix problems via Amazon Youtube and Pinterest - who knew!! So thankful that everyone before me took time to share. 👍🏼!!️🙏🏼
customer_reviews.author: Missy Jo

customer_reviews.title: They do what they're supposed to do!
customer_reviews.text: My hair falls out like you wouldn't believe, and always has. My husband recently got super grossed out and gaggy with a hair clog, so I bought these for our bathroom. They really do what they say, and catch all the hair, but they also lead to poor drainage and standing water in the shower. They say on the package to clean them out every few weeks, but for us, it's been every few days to ensure drainage.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hammerschlag

customer_reviews.title: How did I ever live without these??
customer_reviews.text: We used to have the strainer-types that lie in the hole, but they would get all gross and stained and it was just an ugly thing to see in the tub. These lovely little traps go down into the drain so they look like a normal drain stopper but when you pull them out, all the gunk and hair is clinging to them so it's easy to wipe off, rinse and replace! They're amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Gizowarfum Fleepaflop

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd tub shroom and first sink shroom. I really like the metal style finish, it makes it feel like there is a drain cover and not a plastic thing in the drain. My current bath tub drain is smaller so it fits more snugly which is not a bad thing. I will definitely keep purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Gerat Product
customer_reviews.text: I wish I have found this product long time ago. It would have saved me tons on Plumbers drain cleaning. Mostly it is hairs or soap which stuck in drain and cause issues. It is very easy to clean with old tooth brush. I clean this once a week along with my bathroom cleaning. I could not believe how much stuff It catches with weekly cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Catches all the hair but could be more durable
customer_reviews.text: My wife noted, "Wow, this catches ALL the hair". Great product design in this regard, but the bottom component that sticks in the drain doesn't seem overly durable. The one in the sink already shows some signs of breaking at the bottom part. If they improve this durability then I'd give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H

customer_reviews.title: So easy to clean after shower
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to clean after each shower. I have really long hair (Covid hair, lol) and it falls out a lot (age and thyroid). I didn't think through the sink one. To install it you have to remove the drain stopper (duh) which created an unexpected dive under the sink to unassemble it. Im taking a leap of faith that I won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great for catching hair before it goes down the drain
customer_reviews.text: A good looking drain protector that catches hair before it can get into the pipes. My daughter and I both have very long hair and usually need to clean out the drain once a week or the water gets backed up in the shower. With the sinkshroom, hair no longer gets down the drain and it is wonderful! Great invention and will buy as gifts for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie Graves

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but eventually looks messy
customer_reviews.text: Does the job very well and the cap looks pretty! However, after using mine for a year at a rental, the rubber catcher turned yellow and seems more flimsy. At my new house, I swapped to one with a stainless steel catcher and a rubber ring at the bottom. I'm curious to see if they will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: As expected...
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly, and the quality for the set of two was as expected. I mistakenly ordered the Chrome, but I am happy I did. They are plastic, so who knows how they will hold up over time; however, they look great. I have been using them over a week and have cleaned them once. Cleaning wasn't bad, might need to be scrubbed if not cleaned regularly. They seem to be doing the job, as described, and better than other products I have used in the past. Even if I have to replace them every year or two because they deteriorate (I will update based on longevity), as long as they keep the drains clear, it's worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Tim B.

customer_reviews.title: SinkShroom prevents flow of water
customer_reviews.text: I have a standard sink and drain and the Sinkshroom fits well but the water soon starts to fill up in the sink after a few seconds because the water does not drain quickly enough. I have tried to elevate the SS to let more water through but due to the design, it soon settles back to it's normal position. However the Tubshroom works great and is catching a lot of hair.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Catches everything!
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what it says it does. It catches all the excess hair and crap that would normally clog up my sink and tub drains, my only complaint is the plastic is flimsy. I would recommend getting the chrome or nickel options for a more sturdy look and feel. Eventually I’m going to upgrade to that.
customer_reviews.author: Megan H.Top Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: An, “As Seen On TV,” Product that Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my first TubShroom and it was well-used, so when I saw the combo pack with a SinkShroom, I had to buy it. I love them. I have medium length hair and used to have to get the maintenance guy to clear my drains every six months. Not anymore! These do the trick. I clean the hair out daily and hope to have them for a good, long time.
customer_reviews.author: rachelwrites36

customer_reviews.title: They do catch hair.  Good luck getting them to fit your drains.
customer_reviews.text: I tried these hair catches in my teen's shower & bathroom sink. It doesn't catch anything except hair. They don't fit exactly in the drains, but they do what they are supposed to do. You have to remove the hair catcher & put the old part in to fill the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Steele

customer_reviews.title: Love these things
customer_reviews.text: I love these but the sink one sat up too high for my liking. I trimmed the silicone feet a little with a wire side cutter and now they are the perfect height. If you try that trim a LITTLE at a time; if you get it too low it will probably slow the water draining out of the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: returned item
customer_reviews.text: this was for tub/sink, I ordered, what I thought would fit my sink, this is too big for the standard bathroom sink. Returned this tub/sink one for the 'sink" one.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: ..works as advertised..
customer_reviews.text: ..great at catching my falling-out hairs..does need daily (or every-other day maintenance to avoid water backup, but i expect most won't find that egregious).. ..well worth the price.. ..oh for un-stoppered bath drains & bath sinks only..
customer_reviews.author: c.

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I will never go without one of these for the shower again. I want to buy one for everyone they’re such a game changer. They get a little gunky, but so do your pipes. And any bit helps. And now I don’t have to worry about brushing out all of my loose hair before showering, this will catch it all! Best of all, husband has one less gross thing to complain about. Win.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren K

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at all
customer_reviews.text: This a joke. The water kept filling up in my bathroom sink and almost overflowed. I thought maybe it worked. I wash my hair in the sink. When I pulled it out of the drain there wasn’t a hair caught by it. This product didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa DeMuro

customer_reviews.title: Get it, and take all the credit for being so brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, so glad I impulse-bought the combo pack. The sink shroom already saved a ring from being lost, and they both catch everything! I haven't seen any more hair clumps when "snaking" the tub drain after a full month (4 adults with full/ long hair in the house)! Now, if only all the other adults would just remember to clean it afterwards too...
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany D.

customer_reviews.title: Best Invention Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This little item catches every bit of hair that goes down the drain. It's easy to clean. I recommend that it is cleaned after each shower for easier hair removal. You will never have to buy drain cleaner ever again!
customer_reviews.author: Star Child

customer_reviews.title: Funny Name, Good Product Part III
customer_reviews.text: I have already written reviews on both the TubShroom and the SinkShroom and what a great job they do in keeping the drains clear from hair collecting in them. This is both of those items in the same package. Super easy to install and no problem to clean. Best of all no more problems with clogged drains. These Shrooms are worth getting.
customer_reviews.author: Janet ChandlerTop Contributor: The Beatles

customer_reviews.title: Keeps sliding down.
customer_reviews.text: They do their job fine, my only complaint is I wish the tub one had the same stoppers as the sinkshroom. The tubshroom keeps falling all the way down with the slightest water pressure, or doesn’t stand properly, because it doesn’t have the same stoppers or rubber components to keep it standing and to keep it from sliding down constantly like the sinkshroom does. I have to keep adjusting it every time I shower which has become a huge inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Adela

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!!!
customer_reviews.text: My maintenance guy was tired of visiting me for the same clogged up sink and tub, but is now relieved since I told him about this purchase! This works exactly as they said it would! Happy to have spent the $22 to purchase this!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn D.

customer_reviews.title: Saves my drains from the "pug" hair!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I bathe my pug in the bathtub and it catches all those thousands of little hairs that come off his body! What an awesome product. Just a bit of work to understand how to install it the first time to keep the "cap" on top of it. Now I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a wife and two daughters .... this saves me From going to the store twice a month to purchase liquid plumber. Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Shepard

customer_reviews.title: But this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Helped unclog my bathtub. I no longer have to constantly plunge my tub and bathroom sink or use Drano. It is a must-have if you have issues with hair going down the drain. TMM
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The silver “top” of the tub one fell off and we cannot get it to secure back on; however, this does not appear to effect functionality!
customer_reviews.author: Amy L

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to clean and put back in.
customer_reviews.text: If your tub has a stopper already installed you will need to remove it before this will work. I love ours. I have long hair and before this product our drains were a mess. Now I just pop out the shroom and clean off the stopper with a tissue, then pop it back in. It will not work as a stopper for a bath.
customer_reviews.author: Bobcat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Won't work in sinks where existing stopper can't be removed.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. We couldn't remove sink stopper in one bathroom so used sink hair catcher in a different sink. Works great. Tub/shower hair catcher worked great as well.
customer_reviews.author: MARK M.

customer_reviews.title: It dose the job
customer_reviews.text: They do the job they say they do. They are a flimsy and the rubber part that fits in the drain is warping which is causing the tubsroom to tilt over, causing us to have to adjust it before use and during . The chrome top keeps popping off also.
customer_reviews.author: sharon Word

customer_reviews.title: Handles lots of long hair
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's hair is 4 feet long. I have long curly hair. Needless to say that without this product, our bathtub and sink drains got a lot of hair clogs. I've tried other products, but this one is best at grabbing the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Shan KW

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective!)
customer_reviews.text: It captures the hair really well, it does exactly what it is designed to do. I don't have to worry about my hair clogging up the sink anymore. I clean it once every few days with a napkin. It is that easy. Super easy to install too. The fact that it comes with a hair catcher for both my sink and my tub is convenient. If you have issues with you or someone else clogging up your pipes with hair then I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Fahim

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy Drains
customer_reviews.text: Installation was very easy. All I had to do is unscrew the old drain covers and than just put in the new one. It’s good at keeping hair from going down the drain and it’s easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Vince H

customer_reviews.title: No more slow drains
customer_reviews.text: We are a household of long hair and the tub drain was always getting clogged. This has solved my issues. I clean it every week and shocked at how much hair was going down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: TUB SAVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for anyone with long hair! Super easy to install. Super easy to clean. You will be amazed by how much it catches!
customer_reviews.author: E. Tejada

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for every household.
customer_reviews.text: No more clogged drains! Catches hair that normally would clog up your drains. Since I've bought this, I haven't used any drano. Every household should have this.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not the best product
customer_reviews.text: While this was a great addition to the sink, it is very cheap. I bought the tubshroom that came available in stainless steel and that was better made. I did not like the plastic portion of the sinkshroom. It has gotten bent and damaged over time. It also does not clean very well and looks rather gross over time. The product does do what it says though and it catches the hair, etc. from going down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my friend has one and went on and on about how great it it. It’s true. It’s great. I was having to use draino quite frequently because of hair clogs in my shower. Not anymore. This thing traps the hair and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Clogs be gone!
customer_reviews.text: Married to a woman with the greatest hair on the planet. Good for a drain snake at least twice a month. Been 6 months and not even in need of a replacement, not one clog, and easy to clean after every shower. Unreal how simple of an idea made for better plumbing.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Hands down amazing. I bought these because the the previous tenant had let so much hair down the drain that the tub was barely draining and filling up from the shower. Not any more!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this SinkShroom Drain, when washing my hair, it collects hair and keeps drain from stopping up, the price is great, would recommend for anyone to get.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Connally

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: They seem to catch a lot of hair, but not sure if they catch all of it. I wish they came in a color compatible with bronze fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Annemarie

customer_reviews.title: Do more research
customer_reviews.text: These are okay however. The opening is a little small and if your shower isn’t aligned as well the water just collect there. I had to keep removing every 2 minutes or the shower would just fill up.
customer_reviews.author: Joaquin Silva

customer_reviews.title: Shower use only!
customer_reviews.text: This is only good for shower use. Bath is out. I bought these so I could have something to catch fur after a bath. Nope. Should have returned. Too late now.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: It works perfectly. Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had purchased sooner. Works great, easy to use and clean. Me and my daughters have hair length from mid to lower back, the tub shroom works.
customer_reviews.author: Teamara

customer_reviews.title: These are Great
customer_reviews.text: Work great for my sink and tub. Got a lot of hair, shed easily. this is super easy to remove and clean without having to drain snake.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Eilers

customer_reviews.title: Working great!
customer_reviews.text: These are working out great for us! They are super gross to clean out but that means they're working! It's so nice that the drains are clogging up.
customer_reviews.author: Koda_Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Best hair drain remover I’ve ever had!!
customer_reviews.text: I hate when my really long hair clogs drains but it does and these two little shrooms have saved my sanity!! I love them and they really are the easiest thing to clean and put in and out!!
customer_reviews.author: gigib88

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as promised
customer_reviews.text: Captures hair when it goes into the drain, preventing the need to use various tools to get hair clogs out of the p-trap later on. Cleans easily and quickly. Works great in both the sink and the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work super well for me. The tub size one didn’t fit our tub drain and our sink shroom filled up our sink with water and got really gross, I just prefer the sink without it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hallstrom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This has worked better than i have expected. It not only takes care of the hair from getting in my drain it allows the water to drain faster in my sink because the water hits the top of the device and gives the water a chance to drain better.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and clean. So far caught more hair than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: oregonrain3

customer_reviews.title: Pointless
customer_reviews.text: Wife has long hair and all her hair slips right through. Bought this instead of a drain filter and this is pretty pointless. It is easy to install and clean since it doesn't catch anything.
customer_reviews.author: Dency K

customer_reviews.title: It good in the short term while you wait for the correct drain stopper to come
customer_reviews.text: It fit easily but it got disgusting fast. It was rolling on the ends where the toothpaste and soap got stuck. Its good in a pinch
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Catches the hair!
customer_reviews.text: But drain I’ve found for catching hair. Easy to clean. Not thrilled about the top, wish it was more secure on the ‘mushroom’ it pops off when pulling device out of drain, luckily it goes back on easily
customer_reviews.author: Lamby001

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs one of these
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy (but gross) to clean. Not much else i can say but for shower alone everyone should have one, seriously.
customer_reviews.author: ryan c.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, makes drain look nicer
customer_reviews.text: Does its work as advertised. It also makes the drain plug look nicer than having that mesh type drain cover. The chrome color was a perfect match for my faucets.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: How did I survive without one of these?! I’m so disgusted with everything it catches! I thought because I have super short hair, it wouldn’t work as well. Oh how I was mistaken!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad i put this in. 2 of us have long hair and i clean this thing once a week when it starts to slow drain. It doesnt stop up when its full, drain just slows down a bit. It must be catching everything i never saw so much hair with the old drain stop in place.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Stopped using both of mine. They don’t sit evenly, more tilted. The sink nor tub drains easily without taking out each time.
customer_reviews.author: W. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Shrooms
customer_reviews.text: These are so easy to install and actually work. Would definitely recommend. Would order again. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmom Connie

customer_reviews.title: It just didn't work
customer_reviews.text: It wouldn't drain the water in my shower right away and kind of created a pool of water for a bit. It just was not enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This the best product I have found that provides hair from clogging my drain. I have purchased this product twice and it has not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Drain saver
customer_reviews.text: I like the chrome look. Super easy to clean. I do have to clean it often but it sure beats a clogged drain.
customer_reviews.author: MzVira

customer_reviews.title: Bad product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2 weeks ago and the gray top came off and the actual tube disappeared from the drain. I’m about to call a plummer and spend my last few bucks in getting this crap out!!!!! Buy the one that is one piece not the one with the two piece cap on top of the tube. I’m am so mad!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

product_meta.title: TubShroom and SinkShroom Drain Protectors Hair Catchers for Bathtubs and Sinks, Chrome
product_meta.description: Color:ChromeWe face a myriad of challenges each and every day. Cleaning clogged drains, thankfully, no longer has to be one of them-thankless to the TubShroom and sinkshroom. TubShroom is a bathtub hair stopper that fits snug inside your shower tub drain, effortlessly gathering each and every hair that tries to make its way down your vulnerable drain. Sinkshroom does the same for your bathroom sink drain. These are the Heroes you deserve in your bathroom. You can rest easy knowing that TubShroom and sinkshroom works great for all kinds of hair-- human and pet alike. No more exorbitant bills from the Plumber and no more having to use harmful chemical-based drain cleaners that damage your pipes.
feature_bullets: Unlike regular plugs that go over the drain, TubShroom and sinkshroom fit inside, neatly collecting hair around it
When it's time to clean-up, simply wipe TubShroom and sinkshroom off and go! no harsh chemicals and no more tangled messes
Our bathtub drain strainer and bathroom sink snare fit standard drains and are guaranteed to catch every hair, every time
This award-winning best-sellers value pack is available in gray or in Chrome edition to match virtually any bathroom decor
Fits any standard 1.5 inch to 1.75 inch tub drain or 1 inch to 1.25 inch bathroom sink drain, note: not for shower stall drains

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,541 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
